Hello!
Your Sales Onboarding is starting on {!Case.Class_Start_Date_del__c}.
I want to take this opportunity to welcome you and say how excited I am that you will be a part of the WEX Family.
You are getting ready to undertake the incredible learning process through WEX Sales University. By the end of training, you will have a greater understanding of WEX and it's processes.
Items to remember:
On Day One, arrive at 8:00am at {!User.Street} {!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode}. If you have NOT finalized your paperwork with HR, bring your two forms of ID to complete the Federal I-9 Employment Eligibility Verification form. The dress policy is business professional. You may wear business casual attire during training but we do have you role play a sales meeting that many past Reps have preferred to wear business attire to complete. A group dinner has been scheduled for Wednesday night. All other dinners will be on your own at any of the many fine area restaurants.
